name: Lazr
description:
Lazr's Demo is now available!

This Demo showcases a single level of Lazr, where you control a powerful android that can shoot lasers from it's eyes and fly in the air.

Featuring satisfying new cloth simulations that you can climb on, swing from, cut and burn. Fully destructible and interactive!

Also, there's a Holographic Dog you can pet and play fetch with.

Future Plans

In the next 30 days, a Kickstarter Campaign will begin and a more advanced demo will be released, featuring 2 Missions (8 levels), an Upgrade System, and a new type of Mode7 inspired World Map. So check back often for updates!

You can follow daily development of Lazr on twitter : @_mrgrak
